milestones.title: M0 — Project Setup
milestones.description: Establish repo tooling, CI, docs, and templates.

issues.title: Repo tooling: initialize Node, TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier
issues.body: Setup package manager scripts (build, lint, format). Configure TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier. Acceptance: pnpm or npm scripts exist; type-check and lint succeed.

issues.title: CI: add GitHub Actions for lint and type-check
issues.body: On push/PR, run ESLint and tsc --noEmit. Acceptance: workflow passes on main and PRs.

issues.title: Docs: refine README usage and add CONTRIBUTING
issues.body: Update README with installation and run steps; add CONTRIBUTING with branch/PR guidance.

issues.title: Issue templates and labels
issues.body: Add feature/bug/chore templates. Create baseline labels: a11y, scanner, web, infra, docs, good-first-issue.

milestones.title: M1 — JSON Scanner + Report (Local)
milestones.description: Local JSON-based scanning and a read-only report site.

issues.title: Scanner: basic crawler (same-origin, dedupe, limits)
issues.body: Implement BFS crawl with include/exclude patterns, robots.txt respect, and concurrency controls. Acceptance: crawl a subset of creativegrowth.org within configured limits.

issues.title: Scanner: Playwright + axe-core integration
issues.body: Render pages with Playwright, inject axe-core, collect violations/incomplete/passes. Capture page title and status.

issues.title: Scanner: normalize schema and write JSON artifacts
issues.body: Write data/scans/<timestamp>/summary.json and pages/<slug>.json. Include counts, issues with nodes, and metadata.

issues.title: Scanner CLI and config file support
issues.body: Add CLI flags (base, max-pages, concurrency, output) and merge with scanner.config.json if present.

issues.title: Sample scan and fixture dataset
issues.body: Run a small scan and commit resulting dataset under data/scans/<timestamp>/ for local site consumption.

issues.title: Next.js app scaffold + base layout
issues.body: Scaffold Next.js (App Router, TS) with accessible layout (skip link, keyboard-friendly nav).

issues.title: Local JSON data loader for report
issues.body: Implement utilities to find latest scan and load summary/pages into server components.

issues.title: Overview page (totals, filters, pages list)
issues.body: Render counts by impact, filter controls, and a table/list of pages with violation counts.

issues.title: Page detail view (/pages/[slug])
issues.body: Show issues with nodes, selectors, WCAG references, and copy buttons.

issues.title: Rule view MVP (/rules/[ruleId])
issues.body: List affected pages per rule and link to external axe docs.

issues.title: Deploy initial site (local data mode)
issues.body: Deploy to Vercel (or similar). Document how local JSON is bundled/read.

milestones.title: M2 — Supabase Persistence + Trends
milestones.description: Persist scans in Supabase and enable historical comparisons.

issues.title: Supabase schema and migration
issues.body: Create tables: scans, pages, issues, issue_nodes. Add indices and simple FKs.

issues.title: Ingestion: push JSON artifacts to Supabase
issues.body: Script to upsert JSON data into Supabase. Idempotent by scanId+url+rule.

issues.title: Data access layer (Supabase mode)
issues.body: Server-side fetchers that read from Supabase when REPORT_DATA_SOURCE=supabase.

issues.title: Overview: scan selector and trends
issues.body: Allow choosing scans; show deltas in violations/pages between scans.

issues.title: RLS/read-only policies
issues.body: Configure read-only access for report data; keep keys server-side.

milestones.title: M3 — Interactions + Screenshots
milestones.description: Add scripted interactions to expand coverage and optional screenshots.

issues.title: Interaction scripts support
issues.body: Configurable steps per URL pattern (click, type, wait), with timing controls.

issues.title: Axe rerun after interactions
issues.body: Run axe again after interactions; record phase in output.

issues.title: Screenshot capture and storage
issues.body: Capture per-issue or per-state screenshots; stable filenames and linkage to nodes.

issues.title: UI: show screenshots where available
issues.body: Display accessible thumbnails and full-size views on issue nodes.

milestones.title: M4 — Annotations + Ownership
milestones.description: Collaborative annotations, status tracking, and exports.

issues.title: DB: annotations and status fields
issues.body: Add columns/tables for note, status (open/ignored/fixed), owner.

issues.title: UI: add/edit annotations
issues.body: Form to add notes and change status/owner; optimistic update.

issues.title: Filters and exports (CSV/JSON)
issues.body: Filter by owner/status; export current view to CSV/JSON.
